name: PSN Influence Mapping
description: Tracking and mapping the spread of influence within an organization or social structure to reveal PSN control.

cards.title: Identifying PSN Power Nodes
cards.description: Determining the central figures in a PSN-controlled hierarchy.
bulletpoints: Look beyond public-facing leaders—true control is often behind the scenes.
PSNs rely on strategic placements of enablers to amplify influence.
Identifying financial backers and information gatekeepers is key.
cards.summaryText: Skip the figureheads and hunt the puppet masters working backstage, map the strategic enablers they've positioned to multiply their reach, and zero in on who funds them and who controls the info flow.

cards.title: Tracing Information and Disinformation Networks
cards.description: How PSNs spread propaganda, misinformation, and control narratives.
bulletpoints: PSNs control narratives by dominating key communication channels.
Disinformation campaigns often have telltale signs of message control.
Tracking repetitive messaging patterns exposes central influence points.
cards.summaryText: See how they own the loudest channels to steer the story, detect disinfo campaigns by their fingerprints—coordinated language and timing—and follow repeated talking points back to the central command.

cards.title: Mapping Hidden Alliances and Backdoor Deals
cards.description: Identifying unofficial agreements and silent partnerships used to maintain power.
bulletpoints: PSNs create overlapping business, social, and political alliances.
These groups function through silent partnerships and mutual protection pacts.
Tracing shared financial or strategic interests reveals hidden connections.
cards.summaryText: Chart the interlocking networks of business, social, and political ties, understand how silent pacts and mutual-cover agreements operate under the radar, and follow money trails and shared goals to uncover the hidden web.
